name: Notebook Boy in The Ghostbook
description:
You have made a nice little home on this page in the notebook. But it seems as though someone might be writing a little love story, with ghosts! Quickly run around and erase his notes and doodles to reclaim the page as your own!

Controls:

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys

Press Space to erase

Made for Ludum Dare 42 Jam: Running out of space

Made for Weekly Game Jam 57: Ghost Story
